changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ${table.prefix}_USER_ROLE_PERMISSIONS SELECT r.${table.prefix}_ID AS ${table.prefix}_USER_ROLE_ID, p.${table.prefix}_ID AS ${table.prefix}_PERMISSIONS_ID FROM ${table.prefix}_USER_ROLE_PERMISSION p, ${table.prefix}_USER_ROLE r WHERE r.${table.prefix}_NAME = 'ADMINISTRATOR' ORDER BY p.${table.prefix}_ID ASC;

INSERT INTO ${table.prefix}_USER_ROLE_PERMISSIONS SELECT r.${table.prefix}_ID AS ${table.prefix}_USER_ROLE_ID, p.${table.prefix}_ID AS ${table.prefix}_PERMISSIONS_ID FROM ${table.prefix}_USER_ROLE_PERMISSION p, ${table.prefix}_USER_ROLE r WHERE r.${table.prefix}_NAME = 'GUEST' AND p.${table.prefix}_TOKEN LIKE 'VIEW_%' ORDER BY p.${table.prefix}_ID ASC;
